name: Laptop
description: High performance laptop with quad-core i5 processor, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD.

name: Smartphone
description: Feature rich smartphone with a 6inch of screen, 32MP camera, 8GB RAM and 128GB ROM with 4000mAh battery.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: High quality wireless headphones with great minimalistic design and 20 hours of playback time.

name: Watches
description: Smartwatch with a 1.3-inch AMOLED display, water-resistant design, fitness tracking features and more.

name: Speakers
description: High bass powerful speakers, wired with bluetooth support also, 40-watt power output.

name: Television
description: High-definition 55-inch smart TV with HDR, built-in streaming apps, and voice control.
